text: Géza Csapó (29 December 1950 – 14 September 2022) was a Hungarian sprint canoeist. He was in two Summer Olympics. He won two medals in K-1 1000 m event, a silver in 1976 and a bronze in 1972. Csapó died on 14 September 2022. He was 71 years old.Meghalt Csapó Géza ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Hungary Category:Olympic silver medalists for Hungary Category:Canoeists
title: Géza Csapó
